name: 100  Crypts
description:
Introducing one of the most addictive "Room Escape" puzzle game for Android.

Solve the puzzles and open the door to escape from the Crypt.

From the creators of the hit "100 Gates" a great new "Room Escape" game for Android.

Characteristics:

  • One of the best out door games available for Android

  • Completely free

  • Amazing work

  • Full use of the resources that your devices!

  • Addicting mini puzzles!

  • Gorgeous graphics and sound

  • Difficult level balanced from very easy to very hard

How to play

  • Solve the puzzle and open the current door to get the next level

  • Each level has a different challenge to be solved

  • Use any way possible to unlock: Drag, Shake, Tap the Ground, Swipe, TAP, Tilt, Buttons and so on

  • Many different items available

Remember that in some rooms on the first floor you have to complete the heist in order to open the doors and advance in the game.

Just experiment. You'll love!
